solution_line_template: If {eight_liters} liters is {percentage_capacity}% the capacity of a container filled with water, when the container is full, which is {full_percentage}%, the container will contain {full_percentage}/{percentage_capacity} * {eight_liters} liters= {single_container_capacity} liters.

The total capacity of {num_containers} such containers filled with water is {num_containers}*{single_container_capacity} = <<{num_containers}*{single_container_capacity}={total_capacity}>>{total_capacity} liters
